DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess changes in health-related quality of life in patients undergoing surgical correction of pectus carinatum. In addition, the study assessed long-term effects of surgical intervention in relation to the development of persistent postoperative pain and / or sensory disturbances in the surgical field.
DOC.brief_title: Health-related Quality of Life in Patients Undergoing Surgery for Pectus Carinatum
DOC.criteria: all patients undergoing surgery for pectus carinatum patients without pectus carinatum
